title: I understand why justice means everything for Harry Dunn's parents
text:
As Harry Dunn’s parents left the US on Friday, at the end of a five-day trip pleading with authorities to send Anne Sacoolas, the driver who killed their 19-year-old son, back to Britain to face justice, the pair were open about their dismay at President Trump’s attempt to ‘ambush’ them into meeting her at the White House – presumably in search of a reality TV-style reconciliatory embrace. “The word circus came to mind,” said the family’s spokesperson, Radd Seiger. “If we ever do this, it’s going to be in England when [Sacoolas] is going through the court system.” The dignity of Harry parents is undeniable. Their loss, unimaginable.
